mapper.sql: a.aid AS "aid", a.area_name AS "areaName", a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.area_desc AS "areaDesc", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM auto_area a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.area_name LIKE '%'||#{areaName}||'%' '%'+#{areaName}+'%' concat('%',#{areaName},'%')
AND a.area_code LIKE '%'||#{areaCode}||'%' '%'+#{areaCode}+'%' concat('%',#{areaCode},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auto_area( area_name, area_code, area_desc, remarks, create_by, create_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{areaName}, #{areaCode}, #{areaDesc}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE auto_area SET area_name = #{areaName}, area_code = #{areaCode}, area_desc = #{areaDesc}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE aid = #{id}
